Description: A string of small disc beads of green and blue glazed composition. Many are very faded.
Curator's comments: Also from this burial: ornament (1912,1109.93). Bibliography: F. Ll. Griffith, 'Liverpool Annals of Archaeology and Anthropology 8 (Liverpool, 1921), 75, describes C-Group jewellery from this cemetery without specific mention of this burial.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1981 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities. Jewellery I (368)
